posts.post_content:
Pretty good for Limited. In Constructed, just use [Invisible Stalker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Invisible Stalker) or [Blighted Agent](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blighted Agent).  
  
EDIT: After the prerelease and after playtesting with this a bit, I am an idiot. This is pretty solid. 3 mana for 3 power in blue without a drawback is very, very good. [Drogskol Captain](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Drogskol Captain) keeps removal away and helps the damage pile up fast. ![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol)/![White](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=W&type=symbol) Spirit tribal should be happy to see this card.
